description: Detects use of chcp to look up the system locale value as part of host discovery
author: _pete_0
TheDFIRReport
false_positives: During Anaconda update the 'conda.exe' process will eventually execution the 'chcp' command.
Discord was seen using chcp to look up code pages
name: Console CodePage Lookup Via CHCP
query: (process.parent.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe" AND process.parent.command_line.text:("*\ \/c\ *" OR "*\ \/r\ *" OR "*\ \/k\ *") AND process.executable.text:"*\\chcp.com" AND process.command_line.text:("*chcp" OR "*chcp\ " OR "*chcp\ \ "))
